topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Step 3 - Deploy the Standard Region (Denver Deployment)

body.p: The first phase of the HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation involves creating the lifecycle manager VM and installation services. You will then deploy HPE Helion OpenStack. These components are installed into the Standard Region.

The installation uses Ansible playbooks to deploy the lifecycle manager VM. Ansible playbooks are files that contain scripts that execute required installation processes. You will then use either the HCG Dashboard UI or manually edit JSON files and use the HLM CLI to deploy the HP Helion OpenStack.
